text:
A POST request with only XML payload can be implemented using SOAP/XML-RPC 
sampler, but a POST request with a Url parameter and an XML payload cannot be 
implemented. For e.g.

URL - http://myserver.com/api?id=xyz
XML - <xml>xml stuff here... </xml>

SOAP/XML-RPC sampler doesn't allow any URL parameter (if I put it there then 
Jmeter automatically removes it). This should be corrected.
